title: With recent hacks what should be done to protect us more?
body: With recent hacking of account should there be more security like maybe adding a phone number text to verify important changes in account or and authenticator app like other gaming companies use? I think email alone if not safe anymore.

replies.body:
Security is a legitimate concern, and as an avid user of password managers and Linux, I can resonate with your concerns. We've actually announced on [this page](http://www.riotgames.com/riot-games-security) that we're looking into 2-factor authentication to add an extra layer of protection to an account.

I hope this helped a bit, please let me know if you have any questions.
